filmography.title: Fast and Loose
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, rebellious young woman who falls in love with an auto mechanic, defying her family's social expectations in Hopkins' film debut.
filmography.plot: A wealthy family tries to intervene when their children fall in love with people from lower social classes.

filmography.title: The Smiling Lieutenant
filmography.role_description: A sheltered princess who marries a lieutenant but must learn the ways of jazz and charm to win his heart from his mistress.
filmography.plot: A lieutenant is forced to marry a princess, but he loves a violin player in an all-girl band.

filmography.title: 24 Hours
filmography.role_description: A nightclub singer involved in a tragic love affair, whose murder becomes the catalyst for the film's events.
filmography.plot: A husband is accused of murdering his mistress, a nightclub singer, after a night of drinking.

filmography.title: Dr. Jekyll and Mr. Hyde
filmography.role_description: A barmaid who becomes the terrified victim of Mr. Hyde's abuse and manipulation.
filmography.plot: Dr. Jekyll allows his dark side to run wild when he drinks a potion that turns him into the evil Mr. Hyde.

filmography.title: Two Kinds of Women
filmography.role_description: The daughter of a senator who visits New York and gets caught up in a scandal involving a playboy.
filmography.plot: A senator's daughter comes to New York and marries a man who is suspected of murder.

filmography.title: Dancers in the Dark
filmography.role_description: A taxi dancer with a dark past who tries to find redemption and love with a musician.
filmography.plot: A taxi dancer tries to leave her past behind when she falls in love with a saxophone player, but a gangster intervenes.

filmography.title: The World and the Flesh
filmography.role_description: A Russian ballerina who uses her charms to save her friends from revolutionaries during the Russian Revolution.
filmography.plot: A soldier of fortune risks his life to save a rich girl's friends during the Russian Revolution.

filmography.title: Trouble in Paradise
filmography.role_description: A clever and jealous pickpocket who partners with a master thief to swindle a wealthy perfume heiress.
filmography.plot: A gentleman thief and a female pickpocket join forces to con a beautiful perfume company owner.

filmography.title: The Story of Temple Drake
filmography.role_description: A wealthy, rebellious Southern belle who falls into a life of degradation after a traumatic event.
filmography.plot: A judge's granddaughter descends into a seedy underworld after being brutalized by a gangster.

filmography.title: Design for Living
filmography.role_description: A free-spirited commercial artist who enters into a 'gentleman's agreement' of a platonic living arrangement with two men.
filmography.plot: A woman cannot decide between two men who love her, so the three agree to live together in a platonic friendly relationship.

filmography.title: She Loves Me Not
filmography.role_description: A cabaret dancer who witnesses a murder and hides out in a Princeton dorm room disguised as a boy.
filmography.plot: A nightclub dancer witnesses a murder and hides from the mob in a college dorm room with the help of a student.

filmography.title: The Richest Girl in the World
filmography.role_description: The world's wealthiest woman who switches places with her secretary to find a man who loves her for herself.
filmography.plot: The richest woman in the world trades places with her secretary to find out if her suitor loves her or her money.

filmography.title: Becky Sharp
filmography.role_description: A ruthless, climbing socialite in Napoleonic-era England who uses her charm to rise in society.
filmography.plot: A socially ambitious woman maneuvers her way through British society during the Napoleonic Wars.
filmography.awards: Oscar: Nomination – Best Actress (First Color Film Nominee)

filmography.title: Barbary Coast
filmography.role_description: A woman who arrives in Gold Rush-era San Francisco and becomes the mistress of a powerful gambling lord.
filmography.plot: A woman arrives in San Francisco during the Gold Rush to marry a rich miner, only to find he has been murdered.

filmography.title: Splendor
filmography.role_description: A woman who marries into a once-wealthy family and takes a job to support them, facing their snobbery.
filmography.plot: A woman marries the son of a formerly rich family who disapprove of her because she is poor and works for a living.

filmography.title: These Three
filmography.role_description: A schoolteacher whose life is ruined by a malicious lie told by a student about her relationship with her colleague.
filmography.plot: Two schoolteachers and the man they both love face ruin when a malicious student cooks up a lie about their relationship.

filmography.title: Men Are Not Gods
filmography.role_description: A secretary who alters a theater review to save an actor's career and then falls in love with him.
filmography.plot: A secretary changes a review to help an actor, leading to a complex affair that threatens his marriage.

filmography.title: The Woman I Love
filmography.role_description: A woman caught in a love triangle between her husband, a pilot, and his observer during World War I.
filmography.plot: A French pilot falls in love with the wife of his co-pilot during World War I.

filmography.title: Woman Chases Man
filmography.role_description: An aggressive female architect who pursues a wealthy man to fund her housing project.
filmography.plot: A female architect tries to get a millionaire to invest in a housing project, using romance as a tool.

filmography.title: Wise Girl
filmography.role_description: A wealthy socialite who poses as a poor bohemian to gain custody of her deceased sister's children.
filmography.plot: A rich woman pretends to be poor to gain custody of her nieces from their bohemian uncle in Greenwich Village.

filmography.title: The Old Maid
filmography.role_description: A selfish woman who raises her cousin's illegitimate daughter as her own while the real mother watches in silence.
filmography.plot: An unwed mother gives up her child to her cousin to raise, leading to a lifetime of jealousy and resentment.

filmography.title: Virginia City
filmography.role_description: A Confederate spy posing as a saloon singer who tries to smuggle gold to the South during the Civil War.
filmography.plot: A Union officer escapes from a Confederate prison and goes to Nevada to stop a gold shipment from reaching the South.

filmography.title: Lady with Red Hair
filmography.role_description: The real-life actress Mrs. Leslie Carter, portraying her scandalous divorce and rise to Broadway fame.
filmography.plot: A woman loses custody of her son in a divorce and becomes a famous stage actress to win him back.

filmography.title: Old Acquaintance
filmography.role_description: A flighty, jealous writer who maintains a lifelong, turbulent friendship with a more serious author.
filmography.plot: Two friends who are both writers envy each other's success and struggle with their complicated relationship over two decades.

filmography.title: The Heiress
filmography.role_description: The foolish, romantic aunt who encourages her niece's ill-fated courtship with a fortune hunter.
filmography.plot: A young woman falls for a handsome young man who her emotionally abusive father suspects is a fortune hunter.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: The Mating Season
filmography.role_description: A snobbish mother who visits her son and mistakes his mother-in-law for a servant.
filmography.plot: A working-class mother poses as a cook in her son's household to avoid embarrassing his new upper-class wife.

filmography.title: The Outcasts of Poker Flat
filmography.role_description: An aging saloon girl who is exiled from a mining town and trapped in a snowstorm with other outcasts.
filmography.plot: A group of outcasts from a mining town are stranded in a cabin during a blizzard with a killer.

filmography.title: Carrie
filmography.role_description: The cold, socially ambitious wife of a restaurant manager who refuses to grant him a divorce.
filmography.plot: A young woman moves to the big city where she begins an affair with a married man that leads to his ruin.

filmography.title: The Children's Hour
filmography.role_description: The selfish, eccentric aunt whose lies and negligence contribute to the destruction of her niece's school.
filmography.plot: A rebellious student at a girls' school accuses two teachers of having a lesbian affair.
filmography.awards: Golden Globe: Nomination – Best Supporting Actress

filmography.title: The Chase
filmography.role_description: The hysterical mother of an escaped convict whose return throws a small town into chaos.
filmography.plot: The escape of a local boy from prison affects the inhabitants of a small Southern town.

filmography.title: Savage Intruder
filmography.role_description: An aging, reclusive former movie star who hires a young man as a nurse, unaware he is a serial killer.
filmography.plot: An aging actress hires a young man as her nurse, unaware that he is a serial killer targeting women.
